  33. from __future__ import with_statement
  34. from django.views.generic import ListView
  35. from django.views.generic import DetailView
  36. from django.views.generic import CreateView
  37. from django.views.generic import UpdateView
  38. from django.views.generic import DeleteView
  39. from django.core.urlresolvers import reverse
  41. from models import Entry
  42. from forms import EntryForm
  44. class EntryListView(ListView):
  45. model = Entry
  47. class EntryDetailView(DetailView):
  48. model = Entry
  49. slug_field = 'title'
  51. class EntryCreateView(CreateView):
  52. form_class = EntryForm
  53. model = Entry
  55. class EntryUpdateView(UpdateView):
  56. form_class = EntryForm
  57. model = Entry
  59. class EntryDeleteView(DeleteView):
  60. model = Entry
  61. def get_success_url(self):
  62. return reverse('blogs-entry-list')
